survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Mental Health Resources Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the mental health resources provided by the workplace, including counseling services, wellness programs, and overall support.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources provided by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources provided by your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allows respondents to select multiple options.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How easy was it for you to access the mental health resources provided by your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring ease of access.

script.question_text: How easy was it for you to access the mental health resources provided by your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace mental health resources?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace mental health resources?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace’s mental health resources to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace’s mental health resources to a colleague?
